Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. Given its unique features and benefits, we believe it's worth more than $150 to you. Considering its market value and the cost we incur to produce it, I'm offering it to you for $200. This price reflects not only the product's intrinsic value but also the opportunity to experience its superior performance and benefits. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations and bring significant value to your life or business. Please let me know if you're interested in this special offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
